tool_description: Major League Baseball (MLB) Sports API that provides information on Leagues and Cups with Livescore, Odds, Statistics, Historical Data, and more ... Checkout our Hockey (NHL) API: https://rapidapi.com/sparior/api/hockey1
name: Baseball
title: Baseball

api_list.name: v1/games-matrix
api_list.description: Query Baseball (MLB) scores, stats, betting information etc...

required_parameters.name: gamePk
required_parameters.description: Enter a game ID - which can be found in the **Schedule** endpoint

api_list.description: Get all Baseball (MLB) teams in the league.

optional_parameters.name: teamId
optional_parameters.description: Enter an optional `teamId` to get information only for that team.

v1/seasons
v1/venues
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baseball4.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mlb/venues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baseball4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
